alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:59PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Trego and southern Ellis Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 959 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riga, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ellis around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Yocemento, Hays, Antonino, Toulon and Munjor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central and west central Kansas.
